extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Systems and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the systems are affected by the listed CVEs by checking the installed versions of Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Server, Microsoft Office, Microsoft SharePoint, .NET, Visual Studio, and Windows Remote Desktop Licensing Service.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the systems affected by any of the listed CVEs?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply updates to all affected assets, prioritizing Internet-facing devices and those affected by zero-day and critical vulnerabilities.
